[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@jsplumb/core](./core.md) &gt; [ConnectParams](./core.connectparams.md) &gt; [label](./core.connectparams.label.md)

## ConnectParams.label property

Optional label to set on the connection. In the default browser UI implementation this is rendered as a `label` attribute on the SVG element representing the connection.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
label?: string;
```
